sent.orig: All you need is deep within you, it is an inner fire waiting and reveal itself.
sent.trans: 你所需要一切就在你的内心深处，它是你心灵的火花，等着被发现，被点燃。

sent.orig: I vowed never to reveal the secret.
sent.trans: 我发誓决不泄漏这一秘密。

sent.orig: A field test was done to reveal the dynamics of residue in cotton and soil, respectively.
sent.trans: 采用田间试验方法，研究了戊菌隆农药在棉花和土壤中的残留规律。

sent.orig: Occasionally, nodes will reveal only nonspecific lymphoid hyperplasia, whereas a neighboring node will harbor metastatic tumor.
sent.trans: 偶尔，淋巴结仅表现为非特异性淋巴组织增生，然而临近淋巴结隐匿恶性肿瘤。

sent.orig: Mr Wang to reveal where Sinopec and Kuwait Petroleum agreed to move the plant to.
sent.trans: 汪洋拒绝透露中石化和科威特国家石油公司商定的新址。
